nodes.bodyText: may I know why we see just check style changes in few files? was there any change in check style recently ?

@nsivabalan, not really, it is still the check style from incubator-hudi/style/checkstyle.xml. When I finish adding the doc and comments,I am not sure whether the changes I made meet up the checkstyle requirements, so I scanned the entire project using the checkstyle plugin and found these checkstyle issues, so I 'corrected' them. Are these changes in checkstyle right? should i revert them?
we could make this more descriptive. "Drop duplicate records from incoming records. Drop those records that are already present in the dataset"
Hi  @nsivabalan. I have addressed all of your comments, please take another look
actually, my bad. we should word it differently. "Drop records already present in the dataset". Drop duplicates might give a wrong notion.
